name: Aloha Neighborhood
description: Five-stop mini-quest around the Aloha neighborhood.

checkpoints.name: The Place
checkpoints.clue: A skyline in shadow, a bridge in the mist—find the place named after a craftsman's twist.

checkpoints.name: Blue
checkpoints.clue: Seek the giant painted blue, it will make a drink for you.

checkpoints.name: Yellow
checkpoints.clue: Painted bright like the midday sun, find the guardian that waits till fire has begun.

checkpoints.name: White
checkpoints.clue: Messages travel from far and near—find the box that brings letters here.

checkpoints.name: Signs
checkpoints.clue: Two kids balance in playful flight, while guards keep watch day and night.
